evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS services including Lambda and RDS for efficient cloud-based application development.
They highlight their HIPAA compliance and the use of HL7 standards for health data transmission.
The integration of FHIR for interoperability in health IT demonstrates their commitment to modern health tech standards.
Their API documentation describes RESTful API connections for data exchange between systems.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 or EDI use cases found on the company site.
